data.name: Monkey Valley
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Monkey Valley! It's the early 20th century. You are on a search for your grandpa, whose gone missing on an expedition in the deep mexican jungle. You set off to find him, engage with locals living in the valley and discover dark secrets best left undiscovered...



Be it monkeys, exotic birds, lovecraftian monsters beyond comprehension, who knows what else dwells in the jungle?

Features

  • lowpoly PS1 artstyle
  • engaging and interesting story
  • fully interactable NPCs
  • lore-rich game world
  • eerie, dark atmosphere
  • mystery as the story unravels
  • multiple endings reached by player choice

So why not come down into the jungle? Theres nothing to be afraid of... probably...

data.short_description: Explore the deep jungle in search of your grandpa, engage with the locals, discover dark secrets about the valley and choose its and subsequently your own fate...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5-6500
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 920M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains low-resolution PS1 style gore, body parts, and bloody VFX. Occasional body horror too, but its all in a very easy to view manner with its artstyle.
